metadata.title: CVE-2014-1838 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The (1) extract_keys_from_pdf and (2) fill_pdf functions in pdf_ext.py inlogilab-commons before 0.61.0 allows local users to overwrite arbitraryfiles and possibly have other unspecified impact via a symlink attack on/tmp/toto.fdf.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-logilab-common - 0.61.0-1
python3-logilab-common - 0.61.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: logilab-common package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.61.0-1').
